name: Sapphiric Rock Dodgers
description: Originally made on November 10, 2019 and uploaded to Gamejolt This was my first Gdevelop game. You are a lonely sapphire up in the clouds, all is the same until a cannon bursts through a cloud and starts firing rocks at you! now you have to dodge these magical rocks plummeting towards you. Check out the official soundtrack for this game at: https://soundcloud.com/user-413200712/sets/sapphiric-rock-dodgers-ost-collection
